song_lyrics: Pramukhjī āpanu ṛuṇ chūkavu hu shā vaḍe,
Shabda shu lāgaṇī paṇ ochhī paḍe,
Har tarange sneh motī sāmpaḍe… āpanu 1
Āpe ghaḍyā to am shire fūlo chaḍe.... āpanu 2
Homyā samarpaṇ yagnamā tan man tame,
Satsang ā tav brahma-jyote zaḷ-haḷe… āpanu 3
Doṣh dal dalmā ame to khūpatā,
Āvī ugāryā Nāth zālī bāvaḍe… āpanu 4
Mūḷ jotā sādhutā tujanī jaḍe… āpanu 5
Man mūkī varase ghaṇā e vādaḷo,
Tan tajī varase hajī e kyā maḷe... āpanu 6
Bhay hato nā āp ho to shu thashe,
title: Pramukhjī āpanu ṛuṇ chūkavu hu shā vaḍe

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1161: Sadhu Madhurvadandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
